attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: too many people who get by fine in a normal 4 week working month, struggle to budget for the 3/4 months a year that consist of 5 weeks before the next pay day. Either a systems need bring in where by people are paid every 4 weeks, or people should be paid more for a 5 week month.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
